Author: Tiny_Buttercups98
Text: Oh also at one point when I was binging (but at a smaller weight then I am no so it was oddly easier) i started by doing omad and I just ate a bowl of porridge every day around 11am or after work depending. But also eating 1200 calories helped me start restricting again and now I realise that I go through a lot of binge phases.

Author: Tiny_Buttercups98
Text: Same here. I've just been feeling so sad and anxious that it causes me to eat so much. Seriously like food food a family of 4 in one sitting.  I think I'm going to fast starting from today until monday but I'm not sure I might start tomorrow eat some vegetables today.  I hope you feel better soon and everything works out. Believe me I know how awful you feel right now and if you ever want to talk I am always on my phone (because I am terrifically lonely)
